title: Rush - Clockwork Angels Tour (expanded by }{eywood)
description:
Rush
Clockwork Angels Tour
expanded by }{eywood

The main problem with this album (besides Geddy's terrible mushmouthed singing, that is) is their insistence on using a single show, then putting the optional B-set songs on at the end as bonus tracks.

So I had to fix another album that a record company screwed up.  This now contains the audio for the intro, intermission and exit films and the B-set songs sequenced in the proper places in the setlist.  The only exception is Limelight because the band chose to provide us with a soundcheck version where all the vocals aren't sung.  I searched low and high for a soundboard bootleg from the tour that I could isolate the vocals from and paste them over the soundcheck, but I could not locate one.  Consequently this song remains as a bonus track.
